hero.headline: Your personal medical vault, powered by AI.
hero.subhead: Scan prescriptions, analyze lab reports, and manage your health schedule with a privacy-first AI assistant.

description.0: Instant camera capture for prescriptions & lab reports.
description.1: Automatic document type detection and cropping.
description.2: Powered by advanced AI for precise extraction.

description.0: Visual medication timelines and grid views.
description.1: Smart reminders synced with Google Calendar.
description.2: Track frequency, purpose, and purchase history.

description.0: AI analysis of Complete Blood Count (CBC) and reports.
description.1: Instant normal-range comparisons and health summaries.
description.2: Searchable, encrypted history of all your diagnoses.

section.heading: Complete health oversight.
section.description: From digitizing crumpled prescriptions to analyzing complex lab results, MedVault handles it all.

prescriptionParser.title: Prescription Parser
prescriptionParser.description: Extract med names, dosages, and instructions instantly from photos.

labResultAnalyzer.title: Lab Result Analyzer
labResultAnalyzer.description: Understand complex lab metrics with simple AI explanations.

healthSummaries.title: Health Summaries
healthSummaries.description: Generate concise summaries of diagnosis documents.

calendarSync.title: Calendar Sync
calendarSync.description: Seamless integration with Google Calendar for reminders.

secureArchive.title: Secure Archive
secureArchive.description: Firebase-backed secure storage for your medical history.

medicineCabinet.title: Medicine Cabinet

healthReminders.title: Health Reminders
healthReminders.description: Smart notifications for your medication schedule.

labResults.title: Lab Results

form.heading: Get Early Access
form.description: MedVault AI is currently in private beta. Join our wishlist to receive the latest APK build directly to your email.
form.privacy: We respect your privacy. No spam, ever.

success.heading: You're on the list!

footer.description: Secure medical data infrastructure for the AI era. Protecting patient privacy while enabling clinical innovation.
